SCTX - Script Source:
scn mwBMStal02Script

begin onactivate
	SetStage fbmwBMEarth 30
	playsound3d 0BMSpipeSmedium
	if GetStage fbmwBMEarth >= 20
		if (fbmwBMEarth.soundpuzzlenumber == 1)&&(fbmwBMEarth.answerright == 0)
			set fbmwBMEarth.answerright to 1
		elseif (fbmwBMEarth.soundpuzzlenumber == 2)&&(fbmwBMEarth.answerright == 2)
			set fbmwBMEarth.answerright to 3		
		else
			set fbmwBMEarth.answerright to 0
		endif
	endif
end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 14 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
